item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

The code i’m trying to fix:

}
                public static int gvp(int i) {
               
                        switch(i)
                        {
                        case 962: 
                        return 250;
                        }
                        return 0;

                }

The code above that piece of code

public long buyDelay;
	public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
		if(System.currentTimeMillis() - buyDelay < 1500) {
			return false;
	 
		}

THIS is my error:

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot

Im trying to add a vote for points system. The ‘962’ is the item id,the ‘250’ is the amount of votepoints.This piece of code is in ShopHandler.Java . There is no other ‘public static’ bits of code in there.I’ve been requesting help with this for ages,i wish someone would just tell me how to fix :s Repping ++
